title: I know there are a couple of Diana mains here, some build and gameplay advice?
body:
Item builds? I think I've got a basic idea of it. I think.... Start with Zhonya's or Abyssal depending on enemy team comp, Get Sorc Shoes, Then get the one you didn't get out of Zhonya's or Abyssal unless they are full AD or AP, and then I'm lost from here. If that's wrong, pls just tell me what to get anyway.

Skill Order R-Q-W-E

Combo? Q into R into W and E, AA as much as you can before ulting again? What about teamfights?

replies.body: She's a Jungler, don't play her in lane.
I agree with Sackboy, she fits in very well with the current jungle, and in my opinion, is much more fun to play. I've found that Nashor's tooth is very useful as well.
Well the current jungle favours tanks much much more due to the new Cinderhulk item.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1EHYYHiH,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-16T05:34:35.456+0000)
>
> Well the current jungle favours tanks much much more due to the new Cinderhulk item.

Diana is a tanky assassin, she has a refreshing shield and 3 aoe spells, her clearspeed and ganks are some of the best.

Build (if top against a tank)

Void Staff (abyssal if non tank)
Sorc Boots
Nashors tooth
Deathcap
Ludens
Zhonyas

Abilities R>Q>E>W (last two are preference based)

Combo - Q and W - R - E (if they are running) AA as much as possible

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1EHYYHiH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-16T00:06:58.517+0000)
>
> **Build (if top against a tank)**
> 
> Void Staff (abyssal if non tank)
> Sorc Boots
> Nashors tooth
> Deathcap
> Ludens
> Zhonyas

and a mid lane build?

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1EHYYHiH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-16T00:17:35.009+0000)
>
> and a mid lane build?

No Clue mate, i play diana top or jg, as a mid laner i do not believe that she stacks up against other mid lane assassains, also my mid laners all POKE EVERYTHING brand/ziggs/nid etc.

If anything the build shouldn't change but its entirely up to you to decide how to build her thats just my playstyle
{{item:3001}} /{{item:3157}}  > {{item:3020}}  > whichever you didn't get earlier > {{item:3135}}/{{item:3089}} > {{item:3110}} if heavy AD, or whichever you didn't get earlier > situational item.
